> Intermediaries ARE clients, just not YOUR client. Who knows what they're=

> doing. Your server can't tell the difference.

I know, but what if I car=
e less about intermediaries (think about securing representations - e.g. by=
 https - it will eliminate intermediate caching efforts).

I think there is=
 much more (business) value in concentrating on things like hypermedia, int=
egration and interoperability (serendipitous use).
